website_summaries.verdict: Choose these strips if you have sensitive skin, but keep in mind that they may not stick as well as other options.
pros: Designed to be gentle on sensitive skin
Doesn't tug or tear at skin when removed
cons: The downside of the sensitive skin design is that these strips don't stick as well as some others we considered
It may help to cleanse skin thoroughly before applying

customer_reviews.title: Nice delivery method
customer_reviews.text: Nice delivery method. I guess he had a crystal ball to know what was inside. little toss doesn’t hurt
customer_reviews.author: berad42

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Biggest rip-off ever. It was implied "double" which would mean 60 strips, not 30. But they think double is double 15. I paid $6.00 more for 30 of these than if I had gone to my local drug store. Won't make this mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great after modification for tender skin.
customer_reviews.text: Years ago tried to use Breathe Rright Strips but they tore the skin away. Very disappointed and impossible to use. Just tried these for sensitive skin. Still tears skin over nasal bridge so place one inch gause pad (trimmed from clean bandaid) on adhesive strip over bridge for protection. Still effective adhesion and now can use for good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: MDE

customer_reviews.title: These are not the original ones
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that these were narrower than the original ones which I thought I was buying . When later I bought some at drug store ( originals) , I saw the difference.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The ends lift overnight and I look like an airplane in the morning.  Sad!
customer_reviews.text: The ends lift overnight and I look like an airplane in the morning. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So long as your face is clean of any oils the strips will stay on all night. They come off ok, however, the adhesive leaves residue that is difficult to wash off. Even if I wash with soap and a cloth I find that later in the day I can still feel some of the adhesive on my skin. This is only mildly annoying compared to the benefit received of being able to sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Father Knows Best

customer_reviews.title: Product great but order not right
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for 4 packages of Breathe Right Strips but only got THREE boxes. The product is great but I would like the fourth box!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. William T. Mahon

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for these. My dear, dear husband tends to snore and has tried everything to cure it. These are the most effective, and now we both sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna H.

customer_reviews.title: Packing Issues
customer_reviews.text: The description says “pack of 2,” and the price is consistent with buying 2 boxes. But I only received one box. Looking at the reviews, I’m not alone in this. So, buyer beware. Personally, I will buy these locally from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your mileage may vary
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Breathe Right strips since they came out years ago. There are several different styles offered, along with countless knock-offs. For me, this combination of adhesion and tork (is that the word I want?) is ideal. The fact that they're translucent is not important to me, but it may affect your decision to purchase. I am a loyal user and have yet to try a knock-off that was worth a damn.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nose Strips
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product. It helps me breathe at night. I suffered with breathing issues at night for many years. This product has helped me overcome my nighttime breathing problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dale J. Kooperman

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I don't think this product has as much Adhesion as the others Within their brand. I've had them come off several times night. But, they do help you breathe easier
customer_reviews.author: GrandPa  G

customer_reviews.title: Use these alot
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and my nose becomes stuffy and night. These help me sleep better since I can breath better. Just be sure to clean the nose area well otherwise it won't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Got Allergies?
customer_reviews.text: I'm slightly allergic to my animals, but I love them so I wash my hands a lot, and when needed, I used these at night. They are great! This is one of those inventions I think I should have invented. Effin brilliant! TIP: If you want them to do their job property, wash the skin oil off your nose and dry well before applying or they will simply not stick. TIP 2: If you don't know about neti pots, look them up. They are also a wonderful help for allergies.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alden

customer_reviews.title: The strips work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works for me very well! The one comment I have is that when I first used the strips they sometimes would come off during the night. Then, before adhering them, I started washing the nose area well with soap and water to remove any skin oils. This seemed to work well, as I have not had any more problems with the strips coming off.
customer_reviews.author: jmpazzy

customer_reviews.title: Helps you breathe
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Breathe Right Nasal Strips for several years. They really help in getting a good nights sleep and allowing you to breathe better.
customer_reviews.author: Navigator7

customer_reviews.title: dependable features
customer_reviews.text: if this product works for you in coping with breathing disruption, then you'll find that it has dependable features such as consistent adhesion, flexibility, and removability.
customer_reviews.author: fred akamine

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly because they are less flexible and don't conform to the shape of the nose, these don't work as well as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: RailFan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: This product does fit as expected, and it did not tear my skin. Very easy to remove, and it did prevent breathing issues during sleep - at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: The best nose strips that stores don’t carry anymore
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these nose strips for years and they are still the best ones for me. They are great for my allergenic sensitive nose and the strips say on all night long. The beat part is that it doesn’t hurt when you take it off in the morning. I am happy that Amazon started carrying them as most stores have started to not sell this specific kind of nose strips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: the only strip that works for me-I've tried many & none work like Breathe Right for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the adhesive isn’t as good on these as others I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lebretton

customer_reviews.title: Great concept for sleep and breathing in general
customer_reviews.text: Strips are advertised primarily for sleep and do the job well. Also, they work well if you are suffering from Nasal congestion or allergy problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: nasal strips
customer_reviews.text: These are a little large for my face, but I guess that's the intent to help me breathe better at night. these do not help my snoring at all, as my snoring comes from my throat. I bought these to help my snoring. Though that did not help me there, I do wake feeling more refreshed in the mornings when I have used the strips. I strategically save these and use them for when I am really dragging on certain days or I need energy for the following day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband can’t sleep without them. Not a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than the ones I buy at Costco
customer_reviews.text: These are narrower than the ones I purchase at Costco but it doesn't say that on the box or on the screen. Now I have to use 2 at a time. I will not purchase these from Amazon any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Made of Latex
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Read to the end of product description to Ingredients: These are made of Latex!!
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with breathing and snoring
customer_reviews.text: Helps me sleep and not snore so much. Can breathe better the second they are on. This clear type is easier to take off in the morning than the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: TheVintageVegan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them all the time and sleep like a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian A Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Great price! Arrived quickly and your description was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H. Belton

customer_reviews.title: Order not complete
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boxes of Breathe Right nasal strips and only ONE was in the package. Where's my other box of nasal stirps?
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Vandiver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products on the market! They've improved my sleeping immeasurably by helping me breath more freely at night. I've become addicted to them, even when I've traveling. I've purchased them through Amazon's subscription service for several years and appreciate the product and the service; just be sure you receive the size product that you order.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DH has been using these for 20 years. Don't ...
customer_reviews.text: DH has been using these for 20 years. Don't expect them to stop snoring. But at least he can breath throughout the night. Update 7/19 These are not the same as the original I reviewed years ago. Breath right must have changed the strip technology. My husband does not like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Surprise Oma

customer_reviews.title: Really Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product has been out for some years now and I am addicted to it. I sleep better, I snore less and it is especially helpful during allergy season or when you have a cold. Helps prevent mouth breathing all night long! For some reason the clear strips have a different adhesive than the tan colored strips - try them both!
customer_reviews.author: Straight-Talk

customer_reviews.title: Great for cycling
customer_reviews.text: When sport riding on the back roads, breathing freely is essential. These little strips enhance my inhallation process, so breathing in requires a bit less effort. Just a bit, but the benefit is noticeable over the course of a ride. Definitely worthwhile!
customer_reviews.author: John Techwriter

customer_reviews.title: Can’t sleep without
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for years. Can’t sleep without (deviated septum). No other like it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Breath easy
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised for 2 PACKAGES - I received only ONE PACKAGE a few days ago. Half the shipment! The price I've paid for ONLY ONE is about $5 Dollars more expensive than the same product at the Key West Publix.
customer_reviews.author: iBush

customer_reviews.title: Only Received Half the order
customer_reviews.text: The description says double package however 2 packs of 30 each total of 60. I only received one package of 30. I cannot find a place to contact seller to get the missing one
customer_reviews.author: rickaroo

customer_reviews.title: Only shipped one box.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before and received two. Don't know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.Dalsimer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate delivery quantity
customer_reviews.text: These things work great, but description says you get 2 boxes and they only delivered one. Otherwise they are great, but probably will buy from elsewhere next time.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Only ones that don't hurt to take off in the morning.
customer_reviews.text: Plus they were great when your allergies hit and they are safer to use that nasal spray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: and with good
customer_reviews.text: A regular purchase here. Hubby uses these nightly with comfort, longevity, and with good results
customer_reviews.author: Mashdi

customer_reviews.title: Will only receive one when it is sold as a two package
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered Breath rite strips sold in two packs. Each time I only received one package. So dissatisfied. Need the other box.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tried the rest and this is the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the other brands and types, this lasts and sticks well to my skin which tends to be oily to begin with. I was sick and wore one for 2 nights in a row with no problem (without taking it off)--by the second night, it began to come off at the ends and needed to be replaced. It's that good!
customer_reviews.author: Tivette

customer_reviews.title: A must have for easier night winter breathing in warmer home air
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price! Clear strips are better for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Catie A.

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't helped the snoring
customer_reviews.text: I can feel that my nasal passage is more open, however, this has not stopped my snoring. I realize that snoring carries many factors, which is why I do not blame the product.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta Frame

customer_reviews.title: Best nose strips for larger noses
customer_reviews.text: These nose strips work very well for persons with large noses and sensitive skin. They provide relief and help in providing a good nights rest. Please keep them in stock. The one size fits all does not fit the large nose. The clear nose strips are easier to remove in the morning. The tan ones tend to cause pain when removing.
customer_reviews.author: Georges

customer_reviews.title: Half of Order is Missing!
customer_reviews.text: My order calls for two boxes of BreatheRight strips; ONE ONLY was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Asimo Bliss

customer_reviews.title: I did not have good luck with the knockoffs on this product.
customer_reviews.text: One of very few products that actually does what it advertises. I got sick and tired of never being able to find Strips at Walgreens but found them online. Still overly expensive but worth it to me to be able to breath at night.
customer_reviews.author: david crawford

customer_reviews.title: ... been using these for years and they are really great. This is the only place we can get ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using these for years and they are really great. This is the only place we can get the large, clear nose strips which is what he likes. End of snoring!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for deviated septum
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver for me. I have a deviated septum which makes breathing more difficult, especially at night. When I wear Breathe Right I wake up feeling more rested...if I don't wear one I wake up feeling exhausted. I use them daily. They are also great for colds or allergies to help you breathe. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Another World Terraria

customer_reviews.title: Most important: these work!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product used to be longer, which I liked. Even so, at least the adhesive is strong enough to keep it in place!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Brotkin

customer_reviews.title: Still the best!
customer_reviews.text: These allow me to breathe through my nose when sleeping; otherwise I would have to breathe through my mouth. The "advanced" models are no better than this original classic.
customer_reviews.author: Catholic Christian

customer_reviews.title: They Make Sleeping Through The Night Possible.
customer_reviews.text: These work great, and there are several "models" to choose from. I get them through the subscribe and save option which works great for these. It saves me money and more importantly I don't have to remember to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: GTK

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: For me snoring isn't the issue. It's the difficulty of getting air through my nostrils. Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Shoring

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect quantity delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pack of two and received only one in the pack. I don't know how to file a complaint or recover the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rashid A. Baig

customer_reviews.title: Work for some...
customer_reviews.text: These do work a little (for me) but not significantly. They have this sticky film that keeps them on your bridge all night, and sometimes they fall off. If you have a minor snoring problem- they might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: mannyn

customer_reviews.title: Order arrived in good condition in timely manner!
customer_reviews.text: My order of Breath Right Nasal Strips arrived in great condition in a timely manner. They are just what the doctor ordered! I swear by these strips to sleep more peacefully at night when my nose is stuffy from allergies, which is most of the time!
customer_reviews.author: EdenXPress

customer_reviews.title: Fairer price than local stores
customer_reviews.text: This version of the breath right strips leaves the least amount of adhesive to be cleaned off.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E.

customer_reviews.title: Breathe
customer_reviews.text: I use these regularly. I have a deviated septum like a lot of people so it just makes breathing easier when I lie down. I prefer the clear ones because these are easier to take off in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: jamt

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I snore and have apnea. While not a cure-all for apnea, they certainly make it easier to breathe through my nose. What a great invention, and the price for the 2-pack is a welcome savings.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Vancil

customer_reviews.title: where did this order come from?
customer_reviews.text: item and its packaging smell TERRIBLE -- incense. particularly egregious for a "breathe right" item!
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: nose
customer_reviews.text: the bridge of my nose hurts after awhile it's on
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tagliaferri

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these strips. They are strong and the adhesive comes off when you remove the strip in the morning. No residue left on the skin, especially after you wash your face.
customer_reviews.author: Zoenje

customer_reviews.title: Helps me breathe right
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you want them to do. Clear ones come off easier, but sooner. Tan harder to get off, but will probably out last your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stone

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: There are several types of devices that help with sleep and snoring, this works the best in my opinion and it is hypoallergenic and doesn't irritate my skin or leave any adhesive residue.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Breathe Right Strips Really Work!
customer_reviews.text: Breath Right strips help you to breath properly at night or during sports events. If you find yourself breathing with an open mouth or your significant other complains that you snore at night, try Breath Right strips. I've used the "Large, Clear" strips for years and they really work! Place a small piece of tissue in the center of the strip before applying so that they are easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: SeaFree

customer_reviews.title: No snore!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, it helps me sleep soundly lol

customer_reviews.title: Would not want to be without.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well in helping me sleep, as well as reducing my snoring.

customer_reviews.title: These are great to use
customer_reviews.text: These are great to use. I really hate taking these off in the morning because there's such a difference! The price was fabulous, too.

customer_reviews.title: but these are the only ones that are comfortable and work
customer_reviews.text: My husband can't sleep without them. We've tried 2 different brands; but these are the only ones that are comfortable and work.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great product, don't try the rest
customer_reviews.text: The best, and I've tried another brand, and the CVS brand. Go with this one, and a good price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product I have used every nite for over 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Individual boxes were crushed due to envelope packaging but contents not damaged.

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T STAY ON

customer_reviews.text: only got one box and order says there should be 2

customer_reviews.text: Don't get the generic Breathe rights, you need these bad boys. clear are the way to go. The tan ones just about rip your nose skin off in the morning.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Use one every night, helps me sleep, and help with dry mouth.

customer_reviews.title: The difference is pretty amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the product overall, only trouble with it is if I moisturize after washing my face the adhesive won't stick (makes sense, just a pain is all), that and more than once Ive lost one in my sleep and found it stuck to some random part of my body in the shower...lol. All that being said the difference between having one on and not is incredible. it makes me wish I could wear one everywhere I go all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Pelki

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other Breathe Right strips
customer_reviews.text: These particular strips are a firmer, clear plastic. Not only that, but they have the sticky adhesive that goes the length of the entire strip. The other Breathe Right's that I have used numerous times are beige and the center of the strip is not sticky and has padding like a regular bandaid does. Finally, these strips leave more sticky residue than the other Breathe Right strips I have used on numerous purchases.

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: Not any benefit to me. They did not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn In Houston, TXTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the diff in my breathing within seconds. I wear it every night. sometimes when I get cold symptoms I wear it too. feels great

customer_reviews.title: Good and safe product
customer_reviews.text: Good and safe product. Better sleep breathing. I use it daily and don't irritate my nose skin. I think is better solution than using daily nasal drops, specially for secondary effects.

customer_reviews.title: snore relief

customer_reviews.title: ok for size and number but not the right kind of strips.

Get them from amazon on their subscription service.

product_meta.title: Breathe Right Nasal Strips to Stop Snoring, Drug-Free, Large, Clear for Sensitive Skin, 30 count ( Pack of 2)
product_meta.description:
Breathe Right Original Clear nasal strips are breathing aids for your nightly routine. They lift and open your nasal passages to help you breathe better so you can sleep better. Use them to reduce nasal congestion due to cold, allergies, or a deviated septum and help reduce or even stop snoring due to nasal congestion altogether. Breathe Right nasal strips are the only nasal strips that use 3M technology for comfortable fit and removal. Made with flexible, spring-like bands, they open your nose up to 38 percent more vs. decongestant sprays alone.

No matter what kind of nasal congestion you have, there’s a Breathe Right product right for you. Breathe Right nasal strips come in a variety of strengths, sizes, and types, including original (in sizes small/medium or large), extra strength, tan, clear, and lavender-scented strips. Plus, every strip is drug free and safe to use with other medications. Try them today to stop snoring and instantly relieve nasal congestion so you can breathe better, sleep better, and feel better.



Satisfaction Guarantee
If for any reason you are not satisfied with any GSK Consumer Healthcare product, GSK Consumer Healthcare will provide you with a reimbursement within 45 days of the date of purchase. Please note that because GSK is unable to control the quality of our products sold by unauthorized sellers, the Guarantee is not available for products purchased from unauthorized sellers due to potential quality issues outside GSK’s control. Please contact GSK Consumer Healthcare directly for more information.
feature_bullets: Breathe Right Original Clear nasal strips help you breathe better so you can sleep better
Breathe Right nasal strips are a drug free snoring aid that provides instant relief for nighttime nasal congestion due to cold or allergies
Made of flexible bands that fit right above the nostrils, lifting inflamed sinus passages for easier breathing
Opens your nose up to 38 percent more vs. decongestant sprays alone
Available in sizes small/medium and large and specially designed for those with sensitive skin
